scripts.build:mobile: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.build-views: npm run build && php artisan view:cache && php artisan optimize
scripts.clear: php artisan cache:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear
